segments.text: I told you that she is no fool .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know she is quite an article , but I was not sure of her ability to cope with a boss .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She cannot get in Dutch with him . He is her boss , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But most bosses are fools for woman .
segments.speaker: S2
